column4: On the top bar right click only let's me "Add Panel..." where I can select from a bunch of already installed stuff. I want to add Eclipse to the panel like I do with an already installed app by going into Applications >[path to app like Games] > right click on app > Add this launcher to panel
It seems I would have to add my application to the Applications menu first. How would I do this?
thank you but I got around my problem by installing alacarte (Main Menu) where I can configure the items of in the menu
